column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////But I think I know which table you're referring to: It's the two-top closer to the entrance than the ramen bar. Unfortunately
column2: that pillar is load-bearing support vital to the structure of the building. Otherwise
column3: I would have much preferred a straight line of tables along the "Mirror Wall." But
column6: we are beholden to our corporate headquarters in terms of design elements for our stores.
